weka.classifiers.timeseries.core

Interface StateDependentPredictor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Classifier

    public interface StateDependentPredictor
extends Classifier
    An interface for state-dependent forecasters. Has methods for clearing, setting and getting previous model state. Useful for forecasters which use models which store state of last prediction to be used in the next prediction. Created by pedrofale on 17-08-2016.

    • Method Summary
